lights, and al=
arms when the thing senses different things. But I'm 
guessing I can tap in=
to the circuits and pick a place where the 
different voltages (ever changi=
ng) are and put those into the input 
of a speaking chip.

Humm... I may ju=
st have to open it up again and see what I can do...

- Mike

vilus has words programmed into

nject a word into white
